description: Try our easy to follow Seared T-Bone With Cheat's Beet Relish recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Steak,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Soy free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Seared T-Bone With Cheat's Beet Relish Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 baby cos lettuce, cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue plate or large frying pan over high heat. Rub steaks with 1 tbs oil. Season. Cook on barbecue for 4-5 minutes on each side for medium-rare or until cooked to your liking. Cover with foil and set aside for 5 minutes to rest.
Meanwhile, combine beetroot, jam and vinegar in a bowl.
Heat remaining oil in a pan. Cook beans for 2 minutes, turning, or until tender but crisp and bright green. Toss through garlic and walnuts, cooking 1 minute.
Cut along steak bones to remove meat. Thickly slice steak. Serve on a platter with lettuce, beetroot relish, beans and lemon wedges.
